payload.name: device_id
payload.description: Device ID (0-254). 255 is reserved for broadcast messages.

set_range.description: Set the scan range for acoustic measurements.

payload.name: scan_start
payload.description:: The beginning of the scan range in mm from the transducer.

payload.name: scan_length
payload.description: The length of the scan range.

set_speed_of_sound.description: Set the speed of sound used for distance calculations.

payload.name: speed_of_sound
payload.description: The speed of sound in the measurement medium. ~1,500,000 mm/s for water.

set_mode_auto.description: Set automatic or manual mode. Manual mode allows for manual selection of the gain and scan range.

payload.name: mode_auto
payload.description: 0: manual mode. 1: auto mode.

payload.name: ping_interval
payload.description: The interval between acoustic measurements.

payload.name: ping_enabled
payload.description: 0: Disable, 1: Enable.

payload.name: device_type
payload.description: Device type. 0: Unknown; 1: Echosounder

payload.name: device_model
payload.description: Device model. 0: Unknown; 1: Ping1D

payload.name: firmware_version_major
payload.description: Firmware version major number.

payload.name: firmware_version_minor
payload.description: Firmware version minor number.

payload.name: device_id
payload.description: The device ID (0-254). 255 is reserved for broadcast messages.

payload.name: voltage_5
payload.description: The 5V rail voltage.

speed_of_sound.description: The speed of sound used for distance calculations.

payload.name: speed_of_sound
payload.description: The speed of sound in the measurement medium. ~1,500,000 mm/s for water.

range.description: The scan range for acoustic measurements. Measurements returned by the device will lie in the range (scan_start, scan_start + scan_length).

payload.name: scan_start
payload.description: The beginning of the scan range in mm from the transducer.

payload.name: scan_length
payload.description: The length of the scan range.

mode_auto.description: The current operating mode of the device. Manual mode allows for manual selection of the gain and scan range.

payload.name: mode_auto
payload.description: 0: manual mode, 1: auto mode

payload.name: ping_interval
payload.description: The minimum interval between acoustic measurements. The actual interval may be longer.

transmit_duration.description: The duration of the acoustic activation/transmission.

payload.name: transmit_duration
payload.description: Acoustic pulse duration.

payload.name: firmware_version_major
payload.description: Firmware major version.

payload.name: firmware_version_minor
payload.description: Firmware minor version.

payload.name: voltage_5
payload.description: Device supply voltage.

payload.name: ping_interval
payload.description: The interval between acoustic measurements.

payload.name: mode_auto
payload.description: The current operating mode of the device. 0: manual mode, 1: auto mode

distance_simple.description: The distance to target with confidence estimate.

payload.name: distance
payload.description: Distance to the target.

payload.name: confidence
payload.description: Confidence in the distance measurement.

distance.description: The distance to target with confidence estimate. Relevant device parameters during the measurement are also provided.

payload.name: distance
payload.description: The current return distance determined for the most recent acoustic measurement.

payload.name: confidence
payload.description: Confidence in the most recent range measurement.

payload.name: transmit_duration
payload.description: The acoustic pulse length during acoustic transmission/activation.

payload.name: ping_number
payload.description: The pulse/measurement count since boot.

payload.name: scan_start
payload.description: The beginning of the scan region in mm from the transducer.

payload.name: scan_length
payload.description: The length of the scan region.

payload.name: processor_temperature
payload.description: The temperature in centi-degrees Centigrade (100 * degrees C).

payload.name: pcb_temperature
payload.description: The temperature in centi-degrees Centigrade (100 * degrees C).

payload.name: ping_enabled
payload.description: The state of the acoustic output. 0: disabled, 1:enabled

profile.description: A profile produced from a single acoustic measurement. The data returned is an array of response strength at even intervals across the scan region. The scan region is defined as the region between <scan_start> and <scan_start + scan_length> millimeters away from the transducer. A distance measurement to the target is also provided.

payload.name: distance
payload.description: The current return distance determined for the most recent acoustic measurement.

payload.name: confidence
payload.description: Confidence in the most recent range measurement.

payload.name: transmit_duration
payload.description: The acoustic pulse length during acoustic transmission/activation.

payload.name: ping_number
payload.description: The pulse/measurement count since boot.

payload.name: scan_start
payload.description: The beginning of the scan region in mm from the transducer.

payload.name: scan_length
payload.description: The length of the scan region.

payload.name: profile_data
payload.description: An array of return strength measurements taken at regular intervals across the scan region.

goto_bootloader.description: Send the device into the bootloader. This is useful for firmware updates.

continuous_start.description: Command to initiate continuous data stream of profile messages.

payload.name: id
payload.description: The message id to stream. 1300: profile

continuous_stop.description: Command to stop the continuous data stream of profile messages.

payload.name: id
payload.description: The message id to stop streaming. 1300: profile
